overview: Marcel brings more than 20 years of experience to BelAir Networks, both with successful start-up organizations and with established mainstays of the telecommunications industry. Most recently, Marcel was Head of Engineering at Zhone Technologies Canada and was part of the management team that led the company from venture-funded start-up to public company. Previously, Marcel worked at Nortel Networks, where he was Prime for the Signaling Products portfolio. He also held a variety of management positions with Bell Northern Research. He holds a B.Sc. in Electrical Engineering from the University of Ottawa and has taken many technology, business and leadership development programs through Nortel Networks.
